data.name: Cosmic Monsters 2 Enclaves Dawn
data.detailed_description:
Accompany Francis on his queer journey through the Orasis region and fight with him the enclave that tries to oppress the region.

- Fight or capture wild Cosmic Monsters
- Prove yourself in the 9 arenas of the Orasis region
- Explore the Orasis region
- Train yourself to be a real OSA agent and make your boss proud!
- Prove yourself in the regional league of the Orasis region.
- Tame your Cosmic Monsters and fight with it.
- Equip your Cosmic Monsters with items to make them stronger.
- Find all 239 Cosmic Monsters in the Orasis and KraiGa Region!
- Help rebuild the City of Öhringen with collect ingedients such as "tar or stone blocks"
- benefit from the new catch mechanic



This game does not support microtransactions!

data.short_description: Cosmic Monsters 2 Enclaves Dawn is a 2D RPG Game, explore the ORASIS Region and stop the Enclave!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core/ AMD Prozessoren
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT/GTX Reihe min. 128 MB
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
